lead_paragraph: The Capitals are scrambling for a playoff berth and Alex Ovechkin, the captain of the team and the face of the franchise, is being paid $9 million to hoist his team out of trouble.
snippet: The Capitals are scrambling for a playoff berth and Alex Ovechkin, the captain of the team and the face of the franchise, is being paid $9 million to hoist his team out of trouble.
